name: N-Gen Racing
overview: N-GEN RACING the Powersport of Champions N-GEN, the ultimate power sport, has been born. With extreme low-level flight capability and advanced non-lethal warheads, adrenaline junkies now pilot these megapowerful sportscrafts over huge terraformed circuits in a Mach 2 dash to glory. Man and machine are tested to the limits of endurance and skill. Only the best will achieve victory. • 14 different circuits, located on five continents. • Features 40 real high-powered Jets. • Full Aircraft's customisation to build your own Jets. • Buy new jets with new features: weapons, after burners, auto-thrust vectoring. • Take part in time trials, permits, championships, advanced championships and magic-12 races. • Special adrenaline-pumping head-2-head modes. • Official soundtrack featuring Matt Darey.
